name: Dakshnamoorthy Manivannan
content: D. Manivannan (Dakshnamoorthy Manivannan) Research Group Short Vita Selected Journal Publications Google Scholar D. Manivannan (Mani) Dr. Manivannan earned his Ph.D. degree from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at The Ohio State University, Columbus, Ohio, under Professor Mukesh Singhal, currently Chancellor's Professor at UC Merced. Dr. Manivannan is currently an associate professor in the Department of Computer Science at University of Kentucky. His research interest lies primarily in the following areas and at their intersection: Computer and network security, Fault-tolerance in Distributed systems, Cloud Computing, Mobile ad hoc networks, Vehicular ad hoc networks, and Cellular networks. Dr. Manivannan, with his diverse research group of students from eleven countries, has published in respected journals in the above areas. Students graduated from his group are well placed both in academia and industry. Contact Information: Dr. D. Manivannan University of Kentucky Department of Computer Science Davis Marksbury Building, Room 309 329 Rose Street Lexington, KY 40506-0633 E-Mail: Phone: (+1) 859-257-9234 Fax: (+1) 859-257-1505 University of Kentucky | Stanley and Karen Pigman College of Engineering | Department of Computer Science An Equal Opportunity University!
